item.title: Put your savings in the fast lane AND beat a market crash: JEFF PRESTRIDGE on the best 'smart' tracker funds
item.author: dailymail.co.uk
item.description:
Diversification is key to successful investing. By holding a variety of financial assets - and ensuring any exposure to equities is through a mix of investment funds and shares - you strike a balance between risk and reward.
Increasingly, one of the best ways to get added diversity into your invest...
